name: A Knights Light
description:
Slay hundreds of skeletons on your path to enlightenment with a magical sword to help. Explore a dark dungeon.

Jethro Richards- Art, Programming
Ewan Zimmerman- Programming
Emily Richards- UI Art


Controls-
WSAD- Move
1234- Activate Abilities
Pause- Esc
Cancel/Stop- Right Click- 
Confirm/activate- Left Click
Interact-F

Freesounds- Sound Effects
Free Music Archive- Music
